jobs.name: Front-end Developer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Chance to grow up in your career path
Talented and enthusiastic colleagues.
Amazing new tech in Bigdata & AI
Job Description
Techcom Securities (TCBS) is seeking for a Front-end Developer to join our IT team based in Hanoi office. An ideal Front End Engineer would have 3+ years of experience in building highly scalable UI on the Web/Mobile.
This is your chance to become part of the leading innovative and reputable investment banking team in Vietnam!

We are looking for passionate, talented, and highly motivated hands-on Front End Developers with a creative edge, strong problem solving skills and strong on development fundamentals. We strive to maintain an open culture where everyone is a contributor and feels comfortable sharing ideas and opinions. Our team, drawn from the best product companies, is obsessive in its details to deliver an awesome User Interaction.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Highly skilled at front-end engineering using Object-Oriented JavaScript, various JavaScript libraries and micro frameworks (Angular/React.js Prototype, Backbone), HTML and CSS
Well versed in software engineering principles, frameworks and technologies
Excellent communication skills
Self-directed team player who thrives in a continually changing environment
Should Have:

Builds web/mobile software applications Follows coding standards, builds appropriate unit tests, integration tests and deployment scripts
Assists in defining architectures Collaborates with teams to evaluate existing systems, determines areas of complexity and learns the applications capabilities
Owns success Takes responsibility for successful delivery of the solutions
Communicates continually with the project teams
Explains progress on the development effort
Converts designs and style guides provided by the UI/UX team into functional user interfaces, ensuring cross browser compatibility and performance
Contributes to continual improvement by suggesting improvements to user interface, software architecture or use of new technologies
Nice to have:

Understanding of internal code library (jQuery or any other)
Some record of contribution to any front end open source project.
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Review lương 1 lần/ năm

Cán bộ nhân viên sẽ có từ 12- 15 ngày phép/ năm 

- Bảo hiểm AON cho Cán bộ nhân viên

- Công ty có các CLB thể thao sinh hoạt hằng tuần (đá bóng, cầu lông, bơi lội..)

jobs.name: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Fast-growing tech company with endless opportunities
Competitive compensation package
Flexible working arrangements
Job Description
We are looking for a skilled Backend Developer to join our engineering team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our server-side applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to front-end requests.

As a Backend Developer at our company, you will work closely with our front-end developers, product managers, and QA teams to build robust and scalable applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Strong proficiency in NodeJS, Python, or similar backend technologies
Experience with database design and management (SQL and NoSQL)
Knowledge of web services, RESTful APIs, and microservices architecture
Familiarity with version control systems (Git)
Excellent problem-solving abilities
Should Have:

Implements server-side logic and integrates with front-end applications
Designs and maintains database schemas
Ensures application security and data protection
Optimizes applications for maximum speed and scalability
Collaborates with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Participates in code reviews and maintains code quality
Nice to have:

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Lương thưởng cạnh tranh theo năng lực

- Chế độ bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp

- Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động

- Cơ hội đào tạo và phát triển nghề nghiệp

jobs.name: Full-stack Developer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Work on cutting-edge technologies and innovative projects
International working environment with diverse teams
Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance and stock options
Job Description
We are seeking a talented Full-stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have experience in both frontend and backend development, with the ability to work across the entire technology stack.

As a Full-stack Developer, you will be involved in the complete development lifecycle, from concept and design to testing and deployment. You will contribute to the architecture and implementation of new features, as well as maintenance and improvement of existing functionality.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Proficiency in JavaScript, with expertise in both frontend (React/Angular) and backend (Node.js) technologies
Strong understanding of web development principles and best practices
Experience with database systems (SQL and NoSQL)
Familiarity with version control systems (Git) and agile development methodologies
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Should Have:

Develops and maintains both client and server-side applications
Implements responsive design and ensures cross-browser compatibility
Integrates frontend and backend components
Optimizes applications for maximum performance and scalability
Collaborates with designers, product managers, and other developers
Participates in code reviews and maintains code quality standards
Nice to have:

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools
Understanding of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Chế độ làm việc linh hoạt (WFH 2 ngày/tuần)

- Lương thưởng cạnh tranh, review 2 lần/năm

- Cơ hội đi onsite các nước Châu Á và Châu Âu

- Nhiều hoạt động team building và sự kiện công ty hấp dẫn

jobs.name: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Work with latest cloud technologies and automation tools
Flat organizational structure with direct impact on infrastructure decisions
Competitive salary package with performance bonuses
Job Description
We are looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer to help us build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in system administration, cloud technologies, and automation.

As a DevOps Engineer at our company, you will bridge the gap between development and operations, implementing CI/CD pipelines, monitoring systems, and ensuring the reliability and scalability of our infrastructure.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Proficiency in scripting and automation (Python, Bash)
Knowledge of containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes)
Familiarity with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Understanding of infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Should Have:

Implements and maintains CI/CD pipelines
Manages cloud infrastructure and resources
Monitors system performance and ensures high availability
Troubleshoots production issues and implements preventive measures
Collaborates with development teams to improve deployment processes
Implements security best practices across the infrastructure
Nice to have:

Experience with database administration
Knowledge of networking concepts and security principles
Familiarity with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Chế độ làm việc linh hoạt

- Cơ hội học tập và phát triển với các công nghệ mới nhất

- Package đãi ngộ hấp dẫn bao gồm lương cơ bản cạnh tranh và thưởng dự án

- Các hoạt động team building và văn hóa công ty đa dạng

jobs.name: Mobile Developer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Opportunity to work on apps used by millions of users
Regular tech talks and knowledge sharing sessions
Generous compensation and benefits package
Job Description
We are seeking a talented Mobile Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have experience in developing mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms and be passionate about creating exceptional user experiences.

As a Mobile Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our mobile applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring high-quality, performant code.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Proficiency in mobile development (iOS with Swift/Objective-C or Android with Java/Kotlin)
Experience with RESTful APIs and data parsing
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX design principles
Familiarity with version control systems (Git)
Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail
Should Have:

Develops and maintains mobile applications for iOS or Android platforms
Implements responsive and intuitive user interfaces
Integrates frontend components with server-side logic
Optimizes applications for performance and usability
Collaborates with designers, product managers, and backend developers
Participates in code reviews and maintains code quality
Nice to have:

Experience with cross-platform development frameworks (React Native, Flutter)
Knowledge of mobile app security best practices
Familiarity with mobile app analytics and performance monitoring tools
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Lương thưởng hấp dẫn theo năng lực

- Chế độ bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện

- Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, văn phòng hiện đại

- Cơ hội đào tạo và phát triển kỹ năng liên tục

jobs.name: QA Engineer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Key role in ensuring product quality and customer satisfaction
Exposure to diverse projects and technologies
Clear career progression path with regular performance reviews
Job Description
We are looking for a detailed-oriented QA Engineer to join our quality assurance team. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and a passion for ensuring software quality.

As a QA Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and executing test plans, identifying and documenting bugs, and working closely with developers to ensure that our products meet the highest quality standards.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Experience in software testing methodologies (manual and automated)
Knowledge of test management and bug tracking tools (JIRA, TestRail)
Familiarity with SQL and database concepts
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent attention to detail and communication abilities
Should Have:

Develops and executes test plans and test cases
Performs manual and automated testing of applications
Identifies, documents, and tracks bugs and issues
Verifies fixes and performs regression testing
Collaborates with developers and product managers to understand requirements
Provides feedback on product quality and user experience
Nice to have:

Experience with automated testing frameworks (Selenium, Cypress)
Knowledge of performance and security testing
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Chế độ lương thưởng cạnh tranh, review định kỳ

- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho nhân viên và người thân

- Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động

- Nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến trong sự nghiệp QA

jobs.name: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Create impactful designs used by thousands of users daily
Collaborate with a talented and creative design team
Work-life balance with flexible working arrangements
Job Description
We are seeking a creative and user-focused UI/UX Designer to join our product team. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio demonstrating excellent visual design skills and a deep understanding of user-centered design principles.

As a UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for creating intuitive, engaging user interfaces and experiences for our web and mobile applications, working closely with product managers and developers to bring your designs to life.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design work
Proficiency in design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD)
Knowledge of design principles, typography, and color theory
Experience in user research and usability testing
Understanding of HTML, CSS, and responsive design principles
Should Have:

Creates wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Conducts user research and usability testing
Designs intuitive and engaging user interfaces
Develops design systems and style guides
Collaborates with developers to ensure accurate implementation
Stays current with design trends and best practices
Nice to have:

Basic understanding of frontend development
Experience with animation and interaction design
Knowledge of accessibility standards (WCAG)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Môi trường làm việc sáng tạo, thân thiện

- Cơ hội được làm việc với các dự án lớn, đa dạng ngành nghề

- Chính sách đãi ngộ hấp dẫn, thưởng dự án

- Các hoạt động nâng cao kỹ năng chuyên môn thường xuyên

jobs.name: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Work with large, complex datasets to solve real-world problems
Access to cutting-edge ML/AI tools and technologies
Competitive compensation with performance-based bonuses
Job Description
We are looking for a skilled Data Scientist to join our analytics team. The ideal candidate will have strong statistical and mathematical skills, programming abilities, and a passion for extracting insights from data.

As a Data Scientist at our company, you will work on developing and implementing machine learning models, analyzing complex datasets, and providing actionable insights to drive business decisions.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Proficiency in Python and data analysis libraries (Pandas, NumPy, SciPy)
Experience with machine learning frameworks (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Strong SQL skills for data extraction and manipulation
Understanding of statistical analysis and modeling techniques
Excellent problem-solving and analytical thinking abilities
Should Have:

Develops and implements machine learning models
Analyzes large and complex datasets to extract insights
Communicates findings and recommendations to stakeholders
Collaborates with engineering teams to implement data-driven solutions
Stays current with the latest advances in data science and machine learning
Participates in defining data requirements and collection strategies
Nice to have:

Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark)
Knowledge of data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Cơ hội làm việc với các dự án data lớn và đầy thách thức

- Package lương thưởng hấp dẫn, cạnh tranh với thị trường

- Môi trường làm việc quốc tế, đa văn hóa

- Chính sách phúc lợi toàn diện bao gồm bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp

jobs.name: Product Manager
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Drive product strategy and development for innovative solutions
Work with cross-functional teams across the organization
Competitive compensation package with equity options
Job Description
We are seeking an experienced Product Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a track record of successfully delivering products that meet customer needs.

As a Product Manager, you will be responsible for defining product vision and strategy, gathering and prioritizing requirements, and working closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to ensure successful product delivery.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Experience in product management or related role
Strong technical background with understanding of software development
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
Data-driven approach to decision making
Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities
Should Have:

Defines product vision, strategy, and roadmap
Gathers and prioritizes product requirements
Works with engineering teams to deliver features
Analyzes market and competitive landscape
Communicates product value to stakeholders and customers
Measures product performance and identifies areas for improvement
Nice to have:

Experience with agile development methodologies
Knowledge of UX design principles
Familiarity with technical writing and documentation
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Cơ hội định hướng sản phẩm và tạo tác động lớn đến người dùng

- Chế độ lương thưởng hấp dẫn, bao gồm lương cơ bản và thưởng theo hiệu suất

- Môi trường làm việc năng động, khuyến khích sáng tạo và đổi mới

- Cơ hội phát triển sự nghiệp với lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng

jobs.name: Security Engineer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Be at the forefront of cybersecurity challenges and solutions
Continuous learning and professional development opportunities
Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
Job Description
We are looking for a skilled Security Engineer to join our cybersecurity team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in information security, with experience in identifying and mitigating security risks.

As a Security Engineer, you will be responsible for implementing security measures, conducting security assessments, and responding to security incidents to ensure the protection of our systems and data.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Experience in information security or related field
Knowledge of security frameworks and best practices (NIST, ISO 27001)
Familiarity with network security, encryption, and authentication mechanisms
Understanding of common security vulnerabilities and threats
Problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Should Have:

Implements security measures and controls
Conducts security assessments and penetration testing
Monitors systems for security breaches and responds to incidents
Develops and maintains security documentation and policies
Collaborates with IT and development teams on security matters
Stays current with emerging security threats and countermeasures
Nice to have:

Security certifications (CISSP, CEH, OSCP)
Experience with cloud security (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of compliance requirements (GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Cơ hội làm việc với các công nghệ bảo mật hàng đầu

- Chính sách lương thưởng cạnh tranh với thị trường

- Chế độ phúc lợi đầy đủ, bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho nhân viên và gia đình

- Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, cân bằng giữa công việc và cuộc sống

jobs.name: Database Administrator
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Work with large-scale, high-performance database systems
Flexible working arrangements and work-life balance
Clear career progression path with regular performance reviews
Job Description
We are seeking a skilled Database Administrator to join our IT team. The ideal candidate will have experience in managing and optimizing database systems, ensuring data integrity, and implementing effective backup and recovery strategies.

As a Database Administrator, you will be responsible for the design, implementation, maintenance, and performance of our database systems, as well as ensuring data security and availability.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Experience with relational database management systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server)
Strong SQL knowledge and database design skills
Understanding of database performance tuning and optimization techniques
Familiarity with backup, recovery, and security procedures
Problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
Should Have:

Designs, implements, and maintains database systems
Monitors database performance and optimizes as needed
Implements backup and recovery procedures
Ensures data security and integrity
Troubleshoots database issues and performs root cause analysis
Collaborates with development teams on database-related matters
Nice to have:

Knowledge of NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra)
Experience with data warehousing and business intelligence tools
Familiarity with cloud database services (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, GCP Cloud SQL)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Cơ hội làm việc với hệ thống database lớn và đầy thách thức

- Chế độ làm việc linh hoạt (WFH 2 ngày/tuần)

- Lương thưởng cạnh tranh, review định kỳ

- Các hoạt động team building và đào tạo chuyên môn thường xuyên

jobs.name: System Administrator
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Work with diverse technologies and infrastructure
Continuous learning and professional development opportunities
Competitive compensation and flexible working arrangements
Job Description
We are looking for a skilled System Administrator to join our IT team. The ideal candidate will have experience in managing and maintaining computer systems and networks, ensuring high availability, performance, and security.

As a System Administrator, you will be responsible for the installation, configuration, and maintenance of our server hardware and software, as well as troubleshooting issues and implementing security measures.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Experience in system administration (Windows, Linux/Unix)
Knowledge of networking concepts and protocols
Familiarity with virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V)
Understanding of security best practices and disaster recovery procedures
Problem-solving abilities and attention to detail
Should Have:

Installs, configures, and maintains server hardware and software
Monitors system performance and resolves issues
Implements security measures and ensures data backup
Manages user accounts and access permissions
Documents system configurations and procedures
Collaborates with IT teams on infrastructure projects
Nice to have:

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of automation and scripting (PowerShell, Bash, Python)
Familiarity with monitoring tools (Nagios, Zabbix, Prometheus)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, nhiều cơ hội học hỏi

- Chế độ lương thưởng cạnh tranh, review định kỳ

- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện cho nhân viên

- Các hoạt động team building và sự kiện công ty thường xuyên

jobs.name: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Work on cutting-edge AI and ML projects with real-world impact
Access to state-of-the-art computing resources and datasets
Competitive compensation package with performance bonuses
Job Description
We are seeking a talented Machine Learning Engineer to join our AI team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, deep learning, and software engineering, with a passion for solving complex problems using AI.

As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing machine learning models, deploying them to production, and continuously improving their performance to drive business outcomes.

Your Skills and Experience
Required Skills:

Strong background in machine learning and deep learning techniques
Proficiency in Python and ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn)
Experience with data processing and analysis
Solid software engineering skills
Problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking
Should Have:

Designs and implements machine learning models
Preprocesses and analyzes data for model training
Deploys models to production environments
Monitors and improves model performance
Collaborates with data scientists and engineers
Stays current with the latest advances in machine learning and AI
Nice to have:

Experience with NLP, computer vision, or reinforcement learning
Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment pipelines
Familiarity with cloud ML services (AWS SageMaker, Azure ML, GCP AI Platform)
Why You'll Love Working Here
- Cơ hội làm việc với các dự án AI/ML tiên tiến

- Môi trường làm việc sáng tạo và đầy thách thức

- Chế độ lương thưởng hấp dẫn, cạnh tranh với thị trường

- Cân bằng giữa công việc và cuộc sống với chính sách làm việc linh hoạt

cv.name: Le Van A
cv.description: Xin chào, tôi là Le Van A. Hiện tại tôi đang là...

cv.name: Nguyen Van B
cv.description: Xin chào, tôi là Nguyen Van B. Tôi đang quan tâm đến vị trí...

company.description: Công ty ABC là một trong những ngân hàng hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. Chúng tôi không ngừng đổi mới để mang lại giá trị tối ưu cho khách hàng. Đội ngũ nhân sự trẻ trung, năng động, sáng tạo và có trách nhiệm. Mục tiêu phát triển bền vững, minh bạch và hiện đại hóa dịch vụ tài chính. Cam kết đồng hành và phát triển cùng cộng đồng.
company.detail: Mức lương hấp dẫn, xét tăng lương định kỳ, thưởng Lễ – Tết đầy đủ. Chính sách bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm xã hội theo quy định. Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, hỗ trợ đào tạo và phát triển cá nhân. Có phòng gym, khu vực nghỉ ngơi, trà và cà phê miễn phí. Cơ hội thăng tiến rõ ràng và minh bạch.

company.description: XYZ là công ty phần mềm chuyên cung cấp giải pháp công nghệ cho doanh nghiệp vừa và nhỏ. Với hơn 10 năm kinh nghiệm, chúng tôi đã hợp tác với hơn 300 khách hàng trong và ngoài nước. Sứ mệnh của chúng tôi là giúp doanh nghiệp vận hành hiệu quả thông qua công nghệ hiện đại. Đội ngũ lập trình viên tài năng, quy trình làm việc Agile linh hoạt. Luôn đặt chất lượng và trải nghiệm người dùng lên hàng đầu.
company.detail: Công ty tổ chức training nội bộ và workshop kỹ năng mềm định kỳ. Chính sách bảo hiểm mở rộng cho cả nhân viên và người thân. Văn phòng hiện đại, trang thiết bị tiên tiến, làm việc linh hoạt. Du lịch team building mỗi năm, sinh nhật nhân viên, happy hour hàng tháng. Chính sách hỗ trợ học phí, chứng chỉ công nghệ quốc tế.

company.description: DEF là công ty sản xuất thiết bị điện tử hàng đầu với công nghệ cao cấp. Chúng tôi đặt chất lượng sản phẩm và an toàn lên hàng đầu. Nhà máy đạt chuẩn ISO, quy trình kiểm soát chất lượng nghiêm ngặt. Hợp tác với các thương hiệu lớn trong nước và quốc tế. Luôn nỗ lực đổi mới sáng tạo để giữ vững vị thế dẫn đầu ngành.
company.detail: Chính sách lương, thưởng hấp dẫn và công bằng. Hệ thống đào tạo chuyên môn và phát triển lãnh đạo. Khu sản xuất hiện đại, môi trường làm việc an toàn, sạch sẽ. Có ký túc xá và bữa ăn miễn phí cho công nhân viên. Được tham gia các hoạt động thiện nguyện, phong trào đoàn thể.

company.description: GHI là đơn vị tư vấn chiến lược và phát triển doanh nghiệp uy tín tại Việt Nam. Đội ngũ chuyên gia có kinh nghiệm sâu rộng trong nhiều lĩnh vực. Cam kết mang đến giải pháp phù hợp nhất với từng mô hình kinh doanh. Hướng tới xây dựng doanh nghiệp phát triển bền vững và linh hoạt. Luôn đặt lợi ích khách hàng làm trung tâm của mọi quyết định.
company.detail: Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, sáng tạo và trách nhiệm. Hỗ trợ chi phí tham gia hội thảo, khóa học kỹ năng lãnh đạo. Chính sách nghỉ phép linh hoạt và hỗ trợ làm việc từ xa. Được tham gia các dự án thực tế cùng chuyên gia đầu ngành. Văn hóa công ty thân thiện, năng động và khuyến khích chia sẻ.

company.description: JKL là tập đoàn cung cấp giải pháp tài chính toàn diện cho doanh nghiệp. Chúng tôi hướng đến việc đơn giản hóa quy trình tài chính thông qua công nghệ. Đội ngũ nhân sự dày dạn kinh nghiệm, tư duy chiến lược. Không ngừng cải tiến dịch vụ để đáp ứng nhu cầu ngày càng cao. Xây dựng hệ sinh thái tài chính toàn diện, hiệu quả và minh bạch.
company.detail: Thưởng quý theo hiệu suất, hỗ trợ tài chính khi gặp khó khăn. Gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp cho nhân viên và gia đình. Văn phòng mở, khuyến khích trao đổi và hợp tác đa chiều. Hệ thống đánh giá năng lực minh bạch và công bằng. Chương trình mentorship và career coaching nội bộ.

company.description: MNO là hệ thống thương mại điện tử chuyên phân phối sản phẩm tiêu dùng nhanh. Với mạng lưới rộng khắp cả nước, chúng tôi phục vụ hàng triệu khách hàng mỗi tháng. Ứng dụng công nghệ AI và big data để cá nhân hóa trải nghiệm mua sắm. Cam kết giao hàng nhanh, chất lượng đảm bảo và dịch vụ tận tâm. Làm việc tại MNO là cơ hội để phát triển cùng ngành thương mại số.
company.detail: Cơ chế KPI rõ ràng, thưởng doanh thu hàng tháng. Chính sách bảo hiểm mở rộng, hỗ trợ khám sức khỏe định kỳ. Văn hóa phục vụ khách hàng là trọng tâm. Văn phòng trẻ trung, làm việc nhóm cao, công cụ hiện đại. Tổ chức sinh nhật, liên hoan, team building mỗi quý.
